text: T'urpuqucha (Quechua t'urpu pointed, sharp, qucha lake, hispanicized spelling Turpoccocha) is a lake in Peru. It is located in the Ayacucho Region, Lucanas Province, Aucara District.escale.minedu.gob.pe - UGEL map of the Lucanas Province 2 (Ayacucho Region) T'urpuqucha lies in the Pampa Galeras – Barbara D'Achille National Reserve. ==References== Category:Lakes of Peru Category:Lakes of Ayacucho Region
title: T'urpuqucha
